# sl-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                      | Type                                                             | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   | Disables the button                                              | `boolean`                                                        | `false`     |
| `fullWidth` | `full-width` | Makes the button full width                                      | `boolean`                                                        | `false`     |
| `label`     | `label`      | Accessible label for the button (used when content is icon-only) | `string`                                                         | `undefined` |
| `size`      | `size`       | The button's size                                                | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                 | `'medium'`  |
| `type`      | `type`       | The button's type                                                | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                | `'button'`  |
| `variant`   | `variant`    | The button's variant style                                       | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description          |
| ---- | -------------------- |
|      | The button's content |
